searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT rac.PKID PKID, rac.CASE_CODE, rac.RANSOM_CODE, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR, toc.AGENT_NAME, toc.GRP_NAME, rac.BORROWER_NAME, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = rac.COM_ORG_CODE) COM_ORG_CODE, rac.RANSOM_STATUS, rac.STOP_REASON, rac.BORRO_MONEY, rac.UPDATE_TIME, rac.ISAPPLY ISAPPLY, act.SUSPENSION_STATE_ suspenState FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE rac INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON pro.CASE_CODE = rac.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO toc ON toc.CASE_CODE = pro.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS tai ON tai.RANSOM_CODE = rac.RANSOM_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT part ON rac.CASE_CODE = part.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON app.RANSOM_CODE = rac.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW inter ON inter.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rep ON rep.RANSOM_CODE = inter.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL can ON can.RANSOM_CODE = rep.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM red ON red.RANSOM_CODE = can.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT pay ON pay.RANSOM_CODE = red.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tw ON rac.RANSOM_CODE = tw.BIZ_CODE AND tw.STATUS = 0 LEFT JOIN sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK act ON tw.INST_CODE =act.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE 1 = 1 <ifNotNull ransomStatus> AND RANSOM_STATUS = #ransomStatus# </ifNotNull>
<if test="ransomProperty != null and ransomProperty != 'DEAL'"> AND act.TASK_DEF_KEY_ = #ransomProperty# </if> <ifNotNull teamCode> AND AGENT_NAME = #AGENT_NAME# </ifNotNull> <if test="searchInfo==0 and inTextVal != null and inTextVal != '' "> AND PROPERTY_ADDR like '%'+#inTextVal#+'%' </if> <if test="searchInfo==1 and inTextVal != null and inTextVal != ''"> AND AGENT_NAME like '%'+#inTextVal#+'%' </if> <if test="searchInfo==2 and inTextVal != null and inTextVal != ''"> AND BORROWER_NAME like '%'+#inTextVal#+'%' </if>
<if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMAPPLY'"> AND app.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND app.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMINTERVIEW'"> AND inter.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND inter.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMREPAYMENT'"> AND rep.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND rep.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if>
<if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMDIYA'"> AND can.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND can.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMPERMIT'"> AND rep.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND rep.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMPAYMENT'"> AND pay.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND pay.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if>
searchSql.groupSql: GROUP BY rac.PKID, rac.CASE_CODE, rac.RANSOM_CODE, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR, toc.AGENT_NAME, toc.GRP_NAME, rac.BORROWER_NAME, rac.COM_ORG_CODE, rac.RANSOM_STATUS, rac.STOP_REASON, rac.BORRO_MONEY, rac.UPDATE_TIME, rac.isApply, act.SUSPENSION_STATE_

searchSql.baseSql: SELECT rc.RANSOM_CODE, rc.BORROWER_NAME, rc.BORROWER_TEL, (SELECT PROPERTY_ADDR from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro WHERE pro.CASE_CODE = rc.CASE_CODE) PROPERTY_ADDR, (SELECT AGENT_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO ci WHERE ci.CASE_CODE = rc.CASE_CODE) AGENT_NAME, rc.RANSOM_STATUS, rt.SIGN_TIME, rt.PLAN_TIME, ri.INTERVIEW_TIME, rr.REPAY_TIME, rca.CANCEL_TIME, rre.REDEEM_TIME, rp.PAYMENT_TIME, rt.REST_MONEY, rt.LOAN_MONEY, ri.INTERVIEW_MONEY, rr.REPAY_MONEY FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE rc LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS rt ON rc.RANSOM_CODE = rt.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW ri ON ri.RANSOM_CODE = rt.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rr ON rr.RANSOM_CODE = ri.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL rca ON rca.RANSOM_CODE = rr.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM rre ON rre.RANSOM_CODE = rca.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT rp ON rp.RANSOM_CODE = rre.RANSOM_CODE

SELECT cas.CASE_CODE caseCode, cas.RANSOM_CODE ramsomCode, act.TASK_DEF_KEY_ taskProperty, app.PART_CODE appPart, app.APPLY_TIME appTime, vie.PART_CODE viePart, vie.INTERVIEW_TIME vieTime, rr1.PART_CODE paylonePart, rr1.REPAY_TIME payoneTime, rr2.PART_CODE payltwoPart, rr2.REPAY_TIME paytwoTime, rca1.PART_CODE cancelonePart, rca1.CANCEL_TIME canceloneTime, rca2.PART_CODE canceltwoPart, rca2.CANCEL_TIME canceltwoTime, rre1.PART_CODE receiveonePart, rre1.REDEEM_TIME receiveoneTime, rre2.PART_CODE receivetwoPart, rre2.REDEEM_TIME receivetwoTime, rp.PART_CODE paymentPart, rp.PAYMENT_TIME paymentTime, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER sy WHERE sy.ID = tw.UPDATE_BY ) doUser FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE cas LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tw ON cas.RANSOM_CODE =tw.BIZ_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK act ON tw.INST_CODE = act.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON app.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW vie ON vie.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rr1 ON rr1.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rr1.PART_CODE = 'PAYLOAN_ONE' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rr2 ON rr2.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rr1.PART_CODE = 'PAYLOAN_TWO' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL rca1 ON rca1.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rca1.PART_CODE = 'CANCELDIYA_ONE' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL rca2 ON rca2.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rca2.PART_CODE = 'CANCELDIYA_TWO' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM rre1 ON rre1.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rre1.PART_CODE = 'RECEIVE_ONE' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM rre2 ON rre2.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE AND rre2.PART_CODE = 'RECEIVE_TWO' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT rp ON rp.RANSOM_CODE = cas.RANSOM_CODE WHERE tw.BIZ_CODE = #ransomCode#

column.name: taskPropertyName
column.display: 赎楼环节名(已完成的环节)

column.name: payoneTime
column.display: 陪同还贷完成时间(一抵)

column.name: paytwoTime
column.display: 陪同还贷完成时间(二抵)

column.name: canceloneTime
column.display: 注销抵押完成时间(一抵)

column.name: canceltwoTime
column.display: 注销抵押完成时间(二抵)

column.name: receiveoneTime
column.display: 领取产证完成时间(一抵)

column.name: receivetwoTime
column.display: 领取产证完成时间(二抵)
